docs.lead_paragraph: Suspender manufacturers are profiting by an increased demand for their merchandise, young men especially contributing to the improvement in conditions. The styles that are in most demand are of the fancy, colored variety, and are made of non-elastic webbing. Wide trousers are held chiefly responsible for the returning popularity of suspenders, since the latter aid trousers in hanging properly.
